category.name: Subscription Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: SCM_newsfeed_purge_threshold
preference.preference_description: Defines the purge threshold in number of days for managing the deletion of Newsfeed. Messages older than configured days will be deleted. A valid value is a positive integer. If the value is empty (default value) or 0 (zero), newsfeed messages will not be deleted.
